name: Terminal Access
description:
Terminal Access is a game we build together during the Design + Publish Games with Elm Story livestream hosted on our Twitch channel.

Learn Elm Story: RSVP

NOTE: Games made with Elm Story use Local Storage and IndexedDB to persist game data in the browser. Because Itch hosts HTML games on another domain and then presents the game in an IFRAME, the game will fail to load unless you enable cross-site cookies.
